mapper.select: SELECT pc.product_common_no, pc.category_no, pc.product_common_name, pc.product_common_price, pc.product_common_description, pc.product_common_date, p.product_no, p.product_common_no, p.product_color, p.product_size, p.product_stock FROM product_common pc INNER JOIN product p ON pc.product_common_no = p.product_common_no WHERE pc.product_common_no = #{productCommonNo} ORDER BY p.product_color ASC, p.product_size ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_common WHERE category_no = #{categoryNo}
AND product_common_name LIKE '%${searchWord}%'
